channel.title: Apt 2.0 Released
channel.description:
Apt reaches its 2.0 release:
https://blog.jak-linux.org/2020/03/07/apt-2.0/
Besides tearing out obsolete crypto, it has some interesting features like a python interface.

item.title: Apt 2.0 Released
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Apt reaches its 2.0 release:

blog.jak-linux.org â€“ 7 Mar 20

APT 2.0 released

After brewing in experimental for a while, and getting a first outing in the Ubuntu 19.10 release; both as 1.9, APT 2.0 is now landing in unstable. 1.10 would be a boring, weird number, eh? Compared to the 1.8 series, the APT 2.0 series features...

Besides tearing out obsolete crypto, it has some interesting features like a python interface.

Read full topic
